text: Ratneshwar Lal Kayastha (born 3 May 1944) is a Nepalese politician and former Governor of Madhesh Province. He was appointed as a governor of Province No. 2 by the Government of Nepal on 17 January 2018. He served as a Governor of Madhesh Province from 19 January 2018 to 03 November 2019. == References == Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Governors of Provinces of Nepal
title: Ratneshwar Lal Kayastha
